issues.description: The Animal class in the solution repository uses StringBuilder for the 'name' attribute, whereas the problem statement specifies it as a String in the UML diagram. This discrepancy could confuse students who expect a simple String based on the problem description, potentially leading them to question the intended data type and handle string operations differently than planned.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the 'name' attribute in the Animal class of the solution repository to use String instead of StringBuilder to align with the problem statement's UML diagram, ensuring consistency without altering the educational intent.
